ProductInfo.Features:
12.2 MP CMOS sensor and DIGIC 4 Image Processor for high image quality and speed.
ISO 100 - 6400 for shooting from bright to dim light. - in-camera video editing options.
High speed, reliable 9-point AF system utilizing a high precision, f/5.6 cross-type center point.
Enhanced metering with a 63-zone, Dual-layer metering system for accurate metering between exposures.
Kit Includes: Large Vidpro Camera and Lens Case (Black), + Transcend Class 10 SDHC Card, + Card Reader, + LP-E10 Extra Battery Pack, + 2 of 58mm UV Filter, + Memory Card Wallet, + Cleaning Kit
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T3 Digital SLR Camera Kit + EF-S 18-55mm IS II + 8 GB Master Kit -- Includes: Canon EOS Rebel T3 18-55mm IS II Kit, + Canon 75-300mm III Lens, + Large Vidpro Camera and Lens Case (Black), + Transcend 8 GB Class 10 SDHC Card, + Zeikos ZE-SDR-5 Card Reader, + LP-E10 High Capacity Lithium-Ion Battery Pack, + 2 Zeikos 58mm UV Filter, + Memory Card Storage Wallet, + Digital Camera Cleaning Kit
